sentences.en: "You want more?" roared Claire. "Forget it, honey."
sentences.cn: “你还想要？”克莱尔吼道。“想都别想，宝贝。”

sentences.en: Claire and Beryl were on the organizing committee.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔和贝丽尔是组委会成员。

sentences.en: Claire had been anorexic for three years.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔曾经遭受厌食症3年的折磨。

sentences.en: Claire had made me promise to tell her the truth.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔要我保证把真相告诉她。

sentences.en: Claire had seemed a little irked when he left.
sentences.cn: 他离开的时候克莱尔似乎已经有点恼火。

sentences.en: Claire had seen the taxi drawing away.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔看到出租车缓缓开走了。

sentences.en: Claire had to dress her baby sister.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔得给年幼的妹妹穿衣服。

sentences.en: Claire looked longingly at the sunlit gardens outside the window.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔望着窗外洒满阳光的花园，内心充满渴望。

sentences.en: Claire positioned herself so as not to obstruct David's line of sight.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔为了不挡住戴维的视线挪了一下位置。

sentences.en: Claire showed us how to make a chocolate roulade.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔给我们示范了如何做巧克力卷。

sentences.en: Claire worked to beautify the garden.
He had a dream about Claire.
He knew they had wanted to have a baby, but Claire had suffered a miscarriage after becoming pregnant by another donor.
sentences.cn: 当时他知道她们很想要有个小孩，而克莱儿却通过另外一个捐精者的精子怀孕后不幸流产。

sentences.en: He pictured Claire sitting out in the car, waiting for him.
sentences.cn: 他想象克莱尔坐在外面车里等他的情景。

sentences.en: I spent time with Claire [Danes], and her portrayal of me back then is very authentic. She was me.
sentences.cn: 我和克莱尔相处了一段时间，她对于那时的我的演绎是很可信的，她就是曾经的我。

sentences.en: Oh, yes, of course. Some old woman, Claire something I guess.
sentences.cn: 啊，是的，当然，一个老太太，叫克莱尔还是什么。
萨莉饶有兴趣地打量着克莱尔。

sentences.en: Why not give Claire a call?
sentences.cn: 为什么不给克莱尔打个电话？

trans.tran_cn: 克莱尔（女子名， Clara的异体）
